newsitem.title: USA: RCN Telecom completes acquisition of Liberty Cable.
newsitem.headline: RCN Telecom completes acquisition of Liberty Cable.

text.p: C-TEC Corp's RCN Telecom Services Inc unit said Thursday it completed the acquisition of the 20 percent of Liberty Cable of New York that it did not already own.

RCN said it is now the sole owner and operator of the cable television network formerly operated as Liberty Cable as well as RCN's own extensive new fiber optic telephone, cable television and Internet access network under construction in Manhattan.
RCN currently provides cable and/or telephone service to more than 41,000 customer connections in New York City.
